verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Keep <S%H8104><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> for my salvation <S%H3444><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come, <S%H935><s%> and my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to be revealed. <S%H1540><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H582><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H1121><s%> and the son of man <S%H120><s%> who holds <S%H2388><s%> it fast; <S%H8104><s%> who keeps the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from profaning <S%H2490><s%> it, <S%H8104><s%> and keeps his hand <S%H3027><s%> from doing <S%H6213><s%> any evil. <S%H7451><s%>"

Neither let the <S%H1121><s%> foreigner, <S%H5236><s%> who has joined <S%H3867><s%> himself to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will surely <S%H914><s%> separate <S%H914><s%> me from his people; <S%H5971><s%>" neither let the eunuch <S%H5631><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H3002><s%> I am a dry tree. <S%H6086><s%>"

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "To the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> who keep <S%H8104><s%> my Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and choose <S%H977><s%> the things that please <S%H2654><s%> me, <S%H2388><s%> and hold fast my covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

to them I will give <S%H5414><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> and within my walls <S%H2346><s%> a memorial <S%H3027><s%> and a name <S%H8034><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than of sons <S%H1121><s%> and of daughters; <S%H1323><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> them an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> that shall not be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

Also the <S%H1121><s%> foreigners <S%H5236><s%> who join <S%H3867><s%> themselves to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to him, <S%H157><s%> and to love the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to be his servants, <S%H5650><s%> everyone who keeps <S%H8104><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from profaning <S%H2490><s%> it, <S%H2388><s%> and holds fast my covenant; <S%H1285><s%>

even them will I bring <S%H935><s%> to my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and make them joyful <S%H8055><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer: <S%H8605><s%> their burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be accepted <S%H7522><s%> on my altar; <S%H4196><s%> for my house <S%H1004><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer <S%H8605><s%> for all peoples. <S%H5971><s%>"

The Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> who gathers <S%H6908><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> says, <S%H5002><s%> "Yet will I gather <S%H6908><s%> others to him, <S%H6908><s%> besides his own who are gathered."
All you animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> come <S%H857><s%> to devour, <S%H398><s%> all you animals <S%H2416><s%> in the forest. <S%H3293><s%>

His watchmen <S%H6822><s%> are blind, <S%H5787><s%> they are all without knowledge; <S%H3045><s%> they are all mute <S%H483><s%> dogs, <S%H3611><s%> they can't <S%H3201><s%> bark; <S%H5024><s%> dreaming, <S%H1957><s%> lying down, <S%H7901><s%> loving <S%H157><s%> to slumber. <S%H5123><s%>

Yes, <S%H3611><s%> the dogs are greedy, <S%H5794><s%> they can <S%H3045><s%> never have <S%H3045><s%> enough; <S%H7654><s%> and these are shepherds <S%H7462><s%> who can't <S%H995><s%> understand: they have all turned <S%H6437><s%> to their own way, <S%H1870><s%> each one <S%H376><s%> to his gain, <S%H1215><s%> from every quarter. <S%H7097><s%>

"Come, <S%H857><s%>" say they, <S%H3947><s%> "I will get wine, <S%H3196><s%> and we will fill <S%H5433><s%> ourselves with strong drink; <S%H7941><s%> and tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> shall be as this day, <S%H4279><s%> great <S%H3966><s%> beyond <S%H3499><s%> measure. <S%H1419><s%>"
